name: Levitar Rescue
description:
Levitar Rescue - A starship has broken apart in space and all passengers were ejected to the planet surface in rescue pods. Use your ship's tractor beams to pick up the survivors and transport them to the collector. Hazards include gravity, terrain, turrets, gravity wells, flying saucers and time.

Levitar Rescue is a physics action arcade game that uses procedurally generated levels with a unique random seed algorithm. Unlimited levels, each one different. Higher numbered levels have higher gravity which increases the difficulty.

The game is over when your ship runs out of fuel but you have the option to acquire more and continue the game.
